content: @Mark-Simulacrum Regarding the doc directory issue (https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/9336), would you object to having rustbuild set a special environment variable that disables cargo's clearing behavior? I can't think of a solution that deals with the way rustbuild shares directories. I'm reluctant to have special-case behavior just for rustbuild, but I'm running out of ideas. I don't think reworking how rustbuild structures things is feasible, either.
No problem for me, we have a bunch of that already, but a -Z flag feels a bit better
Yea, that sounds good. I'll work on that and try to get it in before the beta cutoff. Thanks!
(maybe even we'll eventually move the sharing code into cargo)
I'd not be opposed to a backport if it's necessarily fwiw
